snippet.title: Nine Sols 九日 - Crowdfunding Trailer
snippet.description:
Crowdfunding page here: https://redcandlegames.com/9sols
Download free demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1809540/Nine_Sols/

Nine Sols is a lore rich, hand-drawn 2D action-platformer featuring Sekiro-inspired deflection focused combat, immersive storytelling, and unique Taopunk setting.

We are Red Candle Games, the creators of psychological horror games Detention and Devotion. If our latest title Nine Sols is a game you want to see, please consider supporting our crowdfunding campaign!

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/redcandlegames
Visit Red Candle eShop: https://shop.redcandlegames.com/

Follow us  on social media
◾ Twitter https://twitter.com/redcandlegames
◾ Facebook https://www.facebook.com/redcandlegames/
◾ Instagram https://www.instagram.com/redcandlegames/
